description.narrative: The funds will all go towards the construction and development of the solar PV power plant. The capital investment for the project will be financed through FMO, the Emerging Africa Infrastructure Fund and Norfund, all three institutions with extensive experience investing in developing countries, including Rwanda. The shareholders of the solar PV power plant are Scatec Solar, Norfund and project developer Gigawatt Global.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
